name: UX Portfolio Structure & Template
description:
A portfolio highlighting your design process and past work shows others who you are as a designer. The process of creating a UX-design portfolio allows you to reflect on your skills and achievements.


This particular case study structure contains 8 section, they are:

  1. executive summary
  2. role & responsibilities
  3. problems & hypothesis
  4. research
  5. design & test
  6. challenges & improvements
  7. project outlook
  8. your learnings


Reference: Experience, W. L. in R.-B. U. (n.d.). 5 steps to creating a ux-design portfolio. Nielsen Norman Group. Retrieved April 28, 2022, from https://www.nngroup.com/articles/ux-design-portfolios/
